_header: There is a blossom sprung of a thorn
_description: An Epiphany carol — nine quatrains (aaab) with refrain, ‘Deo Patri sit gloria’ and burden: ‘Alleluya alleluia / Deo Patri sit gloria’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
Ther ys a blossum sprong of a thornTo saue mankynd þat was
                    forlorne…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…Þat this was Ihesu full of myghtDeo patri sit
                        gloriaExplicit
